groups.name: compta.security
groups.description: Configuration for Compta Security Commons module.

properties.name: compta.security.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the Compta Security Commons auto-configuration. When enabled, the module will automatically register authentication filters, interceptors, and security aspects.

properties.name: compta.security.public-paths
properties.description: Comma-separated list of URL patterns that do not require authentication. Supports wildcard patterns (e.g., /actuator/**, /public/**). These paths will bypass the GatewayAuthenticationFilter.
